com.vividsolutions.jcs.conflate.coverage
Class NearFeatureFinder

java.lang.Object
  com.vividsolutions.jcs.conflate.coverage.NearFeatureFinder
public class NearFeatureFinder
extends java.lang.Object

Finds all features in a FeatureCollection which are within a specified distance of a given feature.

A spatial index is used to speed up the proximity querying.

Method Detail

findNearFeatures

public java.util.List findNearFeatures(com.vividsolutions.jump.feature.Feature f,
                                       double maxDist)
Finds all features within a given distance of a query feature.

Parameters:
f - the query feature
maxDist - the query distance
Returns:
a List of features found, or an empty list if no features found
